price: 19. Baye bazali kokanga nzela ya Allah, mpe bazali kolukela yango mbilinga mbilinga. Mpe bazali kondima na mokolo mwa suka te.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
